titleStmt.title: A divine antidote against a devilish poyson, or, A scriptural answer to an anti-scriptural and heretical pamphlet entituled A designed end to the Socinian controversie, written by John Smith answered by Francis Gregory, D.D. and rector of Hambleden in the county of Bucks.
titleStmt.author: Gregory, Francis, 1625?-1707.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Richard Sare and Jos. Hindmarsh ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library.
